text.section:
Each food establishment shall have:
A convenient toilet that is:
Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, separated from any room in which food is manufactured, prepared, packed, canned, frozen, sold, or distributed;
Kept in a sanitary condition; and
Properly ventilated; and
A convenient lavatory that is:
Supplied with soap, water, towels, or other approved hand drying devices;
Kept in a sanitary condition; and
Properly ventilated.

Each food service facility which prepares food and provides seating for patrons established after January 1, 1979 shall have available for the public:
A convenient toilet that is kept in a sanitary condition; and
A convenient lavatory that is:
Supplied with soap, water, towels, or other approved hand drying devices;
Kept in a sanitary condition; and
Properly ventilated.
A room that houses a toilet may be constructed within a larger room in which food is manufactured, prepared, packed, canned, frozen, sold, or distributed.
